definition: to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: You can't buy the time and save it in your storeroom even if you are Mr. Gates.
sentences.chinese: 你不能买下时间存在储藏室里，就算你是盖茨也不行。

sentences.english: Can't you tell any larder stories?
sentences.chinese: 不会讲一个关于储藏室的故事么？

sentences.english: They decided to turn their shelter into a storeroom.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定把防空洞改造成储藏室。
如何贮备你的食物储藏室。

sentences.english: He let go of her hand and watched her float vacantly towards the storeroom door.
sentences.chinese: 他让向储藏室门她的手去而且空地看了她的漂流物。

sentences.english: Mrs. Richards quickly hid in the small store-room under the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 理查兹太太急忙躺进楼梯下那间小小的储藏室。

sentences.english: They decided to turn the shelter into storeroom.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定把防空洞改造成储藏室。

sentences.english: Prepare an emergency outfit in your closet.
sentences.chinese: 在你的储藏室里准备紧急装备。

sentences.english: In the lower ground floor, there are archive, technical and storage rooms.
sentences.chinese: 在较低的楼层，有档案室，技术室和储藏室。

sentences.english: Shall I take these boxes to the storeroom?
sentences.chinese: 要我把这些盒子搬到储藏室吗？

sentences.english: The extra office supplies are kept locked up in the stockroom.
sentences.chinese: 额外的办公用品都锁在储藏室裡。

sentences.english: This set of PC keep inside my store room around 2yrs.
sentences.chinese: 这一套电脑收在我的储藏室里面大概两年左右。

sentences.english: Set sufficient levels of stores in the outlet store.
sentences.chinese: 在餐厅储藏室备足足够等级的货物。

sentences.english: We have restaurant-style metal shelves in our closet.
sentences.chinese: 我们在储藏室里放着参观风格的金属置物架。

sentences.english: In a supply room, cockroaches fled as the door swung open.
sentences.chinese: 医疗用品储藏室的门一开，蟑螂四散而去。

sentences.english: The storeroom held the trunks and other household stuff.
sentences.chinese: 储藏室里放着衣箱及其它家用物品。
